data.eml:eml: New species and new records of Tetranychidae (Acarina, Prostigmata) from Thailand

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Naing, Htar Htar, Chandrapatya, Angsumarn, Navajas, Maria, Auger, Philippe (2014): New species and new records of Tetranychidae (Acarina, Prostigmata) from Thailand. Zootaxa 3802 (2): 257-275, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3802.2.7
